verses.name: Leviticus 6:28
verses.text: But the earthen vessel wherein it is sodden shall be broken: and if it be sodden in a brasen pot, it shall be both scoured, and rinsed in water.

verses.name: Leviticus 6:29
verses.text: All the males among the priests shall eat thereof: it is most holy.

verses.name: Leviticus 6:30
verses.text: And no sin offering, whereof any of the blood is brought into the tabernacle of the congregation to reconcile withal in the holy place, shall be eaten: it shall be burnt in the fire.
